## Literaturüberblick

Hier wird es um die Motivation der Forschungsfrage gehen:

Motivation:
"Not only manager characteristics, also fund characteristics are important to explain differences in their performance."

Research question:
"Do younger, smaller funds perform better than older and larger funds?
If so, which of the characteristics is more important?"


## Herleitung der Hypothesen

Auf Basis der Literatur wurden nachfolgende Hypothesen aufgestellt:

\begin{itemize}
  \item \(H_1:\) Kleine Fonds outperformen große Fonds.
  \item \(H_2:\) Junge Fonds outperformen alte Fonds.
\end{itemize}
